Package com.example.service

Class DetailsService

java.lang.Object
com.example.service.DetailsService
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService
@Service @Transactional public class DetailsService extends Object implements org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService
Service class that implements UserDetailsService. Responsible for managing user details, including loading user by email, checking user existence, and creating new users.
